website_summaries.verdict: This option has a clean design and is large enough to support a roaring fire, although assembly may be a chore.
pros: Features a rugged cast iron construction at a decent price
Accessories include a rain cap and a fire tool
cons: Some reports of the hardware being on the cheap side, which could lead to assembly difficulties

customer_reviews.title: Bali Fire Pit chinnea
customer_reviews.text: Great quality easy to assemble good service from the company . There’s plenty a room for the firewood. If you’re looking for a good size backyard fire pit this is one to consider
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, fun fire
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth one of these we’ve gotten. They last about two years with year-round use. Absolutely love it. When it burns/rusts out we take top off, invert it, fill it with soil and use as planters around the yard.
customer_reviews.author: WWP Resources

customer_reviews.title: Made the deck more versatile
customer_reviews.text: Only 4 stars so far because it’s only been on the deck for less than 48 hours. Put 9 16x16 pavers underneath and lifted it with 6 “ pavers to make the flame a little more visible when seated.
customer_reviews.author: Bart Heagy

customer_reviews.title: Buy a cover
customer_reviews.text: 2nd purchase , there great . Buy a cover rust is real and an issue with this product . Will not hesitate to buy another
customer_reviews.author: Lamar

customer_reviews.title: Cheap hardware and difficult assembly
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great fire pit if you can get it together. I would have never managed to put it together without the use of my electric drill. Many of the screw holes are too small or do not line up properly. That being said, once I got it put together and used it, it was great. Also, the screws and nuts are SUPER cheap. The screws strip out immediately, and The holes in the nut’s aren’t even centered. I’ve never seen that before. I would recommend buying a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: A good addition to your back porch
customer_reviews.text: This little fire pit is just the right size. it is easy to clean, burns well and sends smoke up and not into your eyes. I like that a LOT! Its sturdy and easy to load. Parts are simple and strong enough. BTW: make sure you purchase a floor protector mat so you don't burn your house down and also a cover is a good idea. I bought both.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Very good deal, easy assembly, ok quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, looks good, and at a very good price. I would not say it is high quality (thin metal base), but for the price I paid I am very satisfied. I found and identical chimenea at Lowes for $40 more.
customer_reviews.author: smsylvia

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is intended to do
customer_reviews.text: Works ok, but fasters are real absolute garbage. One screw striped out, had to replace it with a stainless steal button head 1/4-20. Screws that survived, are starting to rust already. The racks above the cleanout is sagging somewhat from the hot coals that were perched on it during a hot fire. I guess that some sagging would be normal taking into account that there was a lot of heat. I gave it a good shakedown cruise after I put it together. Outside of its weak points, it supports a good fire and does what it’s intended for quite well. I you're willing to make some modifications where needed its not a bad little fire place / fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: Maine

customer_reviews.title: Great fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Great fire pit, the chimnea works great to divert the smoke up and not out the sides. Easy to assemble. It’s lighter than expected, but sturdy. A nice addition to my backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: The Best Patio Fire-Pit Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this fire-pit, it's excellent construction of cast-iron steel is unmatched. The fire-tray underneath for easy cleaning along with a fire-plate underneath as well... Would I purchase this again? Yes!!
customer_reviews.author: Wm.Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: For $150 this is a great product. It was easy to assemble, took about 10-15 minutes. The grates inside could be a bit more heavy duty but again, for the price this is 100% acceptable. I would recommend to anyone looking for outdoor fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for deck
customer_reviews.text: love the new chiminea! Was received super quick! Easy to put together, perfect size for deck! Decent quality cast iron and great price, along with free shipping. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Fun Stuff!

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I carefully read other reviews and understand some of the complaints, but my assembly was flawless. All the holes lined up, the hardware seemed adequate. The hardware will rust and if necessary I may replace with stainless steel (about $6 at Ace Hardware) but for now it works fine. Once assembled it's very sturdy. No concerns or complaints at all!
customer_reviews.author: Scotty36

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is nicer than I would have expected and I can build quite a fire.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so pleased with my purchase. I had searched for a chimera and was going to buy a clay version, until I read had much care they needed, especially since I live in a climate that Is fairly wet during winter. Some of the other cast iron versions were heavy starting at about 70 lbs. This one is 40 lbs and a a perfect size fit my deck. This is such an attractive fireplace, I really like how it looks. The thing I love the most, the smoke gets funneled straight up the chimney no side smoke, perfection. People can enjoy it from all sides without having to dodge the smoke.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Patton

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased-but buy the cover!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. This is a great chiminea because it is open all the way around so no matter where you sit, you have a nice view. I also like that there is an enclosure that opens and closes containing stray sparks. I wish there was a handle that could stay cool for the door to make opening easier when it is hot as using the little poker tool is a bit awkward. I highly recommend you purchase the matching over as it fits great and protect it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Magoon

customer_reviews.title: Casting is rough
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this chimney a couple times. Was a little disappointed in quality of the cast iron because it is very rough. Assembly was easy and all parts were there. I bought a cover as many recommended. After 1st fire it rained later that night and it had rust on screws and on cast iron part the next day. If rust bothers you definitely get the Matching cover which is very heavy duty and has a draw string on bottom. For the price it functions well. With the cover it should last several years.
customer_reviews.author: gafleeman

customer_reviews.title: Assembly went well. Prefer more cast iron on legs and base
customer_reviews.text: So far so going ok. I put this together and followed the suggestion to spray w heat paint used.on wood burning stoves (Rustoleum) One person assembly was not difficult but w 2 people it would go a bit faster. I would have liked legs and base to he cast iron as they are steel. Instructions say use of 3/8 wrench but bolts are 10mm. A couple of bolts are a bit difficult to install but not impossible. I'm assuming chimney cap comes off when having a fire
customer_reviews.author: J Rules

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should/Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after doing some research and found this one had a cast iron top for heat dissipation and weight. Easy to assemble and I bought some black high heat paint to spray all components before assembling to reduce rusting. 5 fires so far in 2 months and still looking new. Cannot beat this for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kearnzy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We searched for a long time to find a chiminea that would meet our needs. Many were too small and we didn’t want one with a small opening on one side. This is perfect. It holds a lot of firewood AND evenly distributes the heat as it’s open all around. It was also engineered very well, the smoke goes up out the top vs. the sides—another concern before trying out. We are very happy with this purchase and plan to enjoy this in our backyard for years to come!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Have to say it's actually nicer than expected. Put together in less than 1/2 hour and it holds a good fire. For the price it's exceptional. Not too heavy that I can't move it by myself but it's still sturdy. The only drawbacks are the interior grates are not sturdy enough and will have to be replaced at some time and it's hard to get a cover to fit right. You will need to purchase the Bali one. Overall great 👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: We have yet to use this, but very pleased assembly and final look, weight, etc. Definitely glad we got a cover though to protect the cast iron from crazy Midwest weather.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Legs are stamped not cast.  GREAT customer service
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a 3 star because of the discrepancy in the product description. The ad states the legs are cast iron. They are not. They are stamped steel (see pictures). The only cast iron is the upper portion above the cage and the lid. Some of the assembly holes do not line up correctly and need to be nudged into place (as is common in Chinese made products). The company has excellent customer service. They immediately ordered replacements for damaged parts. They answered my request quickly. The replacement parts arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Happy camper

customer_reviews.title: Not real sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Descent heat for the size and it looks pretty good but, after 2 uses the grates have already warped quite a bit . A little high priced.
customer_reviews.author: BrendaAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! A bit smaller inside than I expected but perfect for a fire pit
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Perfect firepit
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace one similar that lasted for almost 20 years. This one has the same heavy duty cast iron so feeling confident it will last as long. First fire was amazingly perfect. Smoke draws up and over heads of people hanging around. And we chose this because the open fire goes 360' so everyone in the circle gets the fire view and heat. Great design.
customer_reviews.author: Carrbondale

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble..but not in the 20 minutes they claim.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble by someone like me who seems to enjoy the assembly process. Screws all matched up with the holes and none of them stripped. Electric screwdriver sure helped. And so did the second person assistant. Haven't built a fire yet; too hot. I'm optimistic.
customer_reviews.author: H Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first and detained me to buy it, but I love it, perfect size. We could not be happier I understand it will take a little bit of work to put it together, but not complicated enough to not like it.
customer_reviews.author: Fredy A Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: WEAR GLOVES
customer_reviews.text: Be VERY careful when assembling. The screen parts are rough and in some places the wire is exposed at the edge. The welds holding the ash tray brackets are minimal. Its passable for the money but not a real bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Florey

customer_reviews.title: Well built. Easy to assemble. Nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried it yet but appears it will work well. Easy for one person to put together. Seems well built. Holes and parts matched up. Look forward to trying it out but 90 here so will have to wait a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Mika

customer_reviews.title: looks great and no smoke in my face
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid piece. Very sturdy and stable. Fairly easy to assemble. Most importantly, it looks very nice and you can see the fire from any seat. The smoke goes straight up despite wind direction. My only negative is that the fire box is a little small. I wish that it was a little bigger overall.
customer_reviews.author: MGL

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Super thin cheap metal. It arrived with bent pieces that don’t at all line up properly. Bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very nice product
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine for quite a few months now. It's awesome. The size is great for large fires. And it is very sturdy and looks fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Filler Joe

customer_reviews.title: Assembly takes some time, directions aren't the best.
customer_reviews.text: Like the way it burns and allows 360 view of the fire. Assembly takes some time, the product is not precisely engineered and will take some elbow grease to force the pieces into place for the nut and bolt attachments. Some welded nuts to the parts would make it much easier to assemble. The top is very thin cast iron - so be careful, it might break easily. Bottom parts are thin metal, but LOOKS GREAT! AND WORKS GREAT. We'll see how long it lasts outside. The past few metal fire rings I had only lasted two seasons. We shall see.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Bali Outdoors Chimenea Fire Pit
customer_reviews.text: My son gifted this to me for Mothers Day. I absolutely love it. It is perfect for my small patio/yard. It throws a good bit of heat, and we love cooking with it using wiener sticks and mountain pie irons. I can't wait for fall to use it even more!
customer_reviews.author: Drake's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, looks great, nice warmth
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my cement patio. It works really well and looks great. I am used to an open fire pit, which allows for bigger fires. The fire size is smaller, but it's really nice and the chimney heats up offering a good amount of heat.
customer_reviews.author: Rural Camper

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy design and construction.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. It is pretty flimsy cast iron material. Careful using power tools and the screws that come with the device are not designed to hold up to power tools. Even on their lowest setting. Overall, I can’t imagine this contraption last very long. Wouldn’t recommend, unless you are looking for shoTry term use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Sturdy Fire Pit
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this fire pit. I’ve ordered this for my nephew who just bought a home. I had one, ordered for my sister and mother in law. As you can tell, my family enjoy sitting by the fire pit and roasting marshmallows etc.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: This was much bigger than I thought .. totally my fault for not reading the measurements!! But it’s also much nicer than I expected!! Win win!! Easy to put together and it was just me. Well worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Lowieanne

customer_reviews.title: Solidly built.
customer_reviews.text: I am a 58 year old woman and this was very easy to assemble by myself. Very solid. We all love it—even the dog.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Nice firepit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Over all a good firepit. The firebox is a little light weight and the grate is very poor. Makes a nice fire and most of the smoke goes up the chimney. Works well for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's good looking and makes a nice fire display
customer_reviews.text: This is our first chimney style fire pit and we love to be able to see the flames from the side, while with a box-style you have to stand next to it to be able to enjoy the view. It's decently made and still in one piece after a summer of use :)
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Have enjoyed being able to have a fire in this
customer_reviews.text: Really like the chiminea, but it came with paint flaking off because they painted over rust. Had to sand down rusted areas and repaint, or I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Clairc

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating assembly!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly requires a minimum of four hands and tiny fingers. Also some muscle and a ton of patience. The instructions say you need a 3/8" wrench, but that was a lie. It must be metric because 3/8 is too small and 7/16 is too big. I didn't have a metric set, so I improvised with an adjustable wrench. The bottom is not as sturdy as I expected, but time will tell. We have yet to load it and light it. I may add to this review once we do.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Carley

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far. Assembly took maybe 30 minutes. Got this to keep smoke away from wife/kids with allergies. So far it seems to do that well.
customer_reviews.author: ACustomer123

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We have had our fire pit for one week and it is already beginning to rust on the chimney. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great chimenea
customer_reviews.text: Love this chimenea. Design allows for a 360 degree view of the fire. Provides heat all the way around. Unit is built well and retractable screen permits easy access to insert wood. While closing the screen helps prevent sparks from escaping. Really enjoying the ambiance this provides to our evenings on the patio.
customer_reviews.author: MEW

customer_reviews.title: So far; so good
customer_reviews.text: After only one use I am pleased with the purchase. Went together well. It’s sturdy so try to put it together close to final location. So far; so good
customer_reviews.author: Sue O.

customer_reviews.title: Got what I paid for
customer_reviews.text: Only cast iron part was the top. The grate is such minimal gauge that I do not expect it to last long. Typical Chinese product.
customer_reviews.author: Heffy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a patio
customer_reviews.text: Just what we wanted. Easy to use. We live in a large city and houses are close together. We like the stack so the smoke goes up. It’s compact, but my kids can still roast marshmallows. Perfect for a patio.
customer_reviews.author: J13Long

customer_reviews.title: Happy camper on the back porch:)
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a Christmas gift to my mother in law. She is very pleased with it. It even arrived a day earlier than was scheduled.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: have not used yet but well put together, easy to assemble, easy to move sturdy, good value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Ammerman

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Chimenea - even though I was looking for a clay chimenea this one is good also.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Good little chimney puts out just enough heat for my back patio and I love the fact that you can feel the heat all the way around because of the screen.
customer_reviews.author: @homeshopper

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty
customer_reviews.text: Just got it on Friday. Put together yesterday. Haven't used it yet. Excited to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: HAHElledge

customer_reviews.title: Nice fire pit but...
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace the old one. Top has 4 holes to attach to mesh area... one hole did not match up to attach. Bottom section to hold wood seems useless. This would not stay attached no matter how much we adjusted it. Otherwise it looks great! Big for what I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! Love it and it beautiful too. Would recommend this to all looking for a backyard fire. Best Buy yoo❤️
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Chatelle

customer_reviews.title: Love sitting next to this!
customer_reviews.text: I had a clay chimenea that fell apart after it was drenched in a rain storm. So I read up on chimeneas and came across this one. It was very easy to put together and has weathered several rain storms!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Homme

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I saw complaints about assembly, but everything lined up well and assembled as expected.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Very good deal
customer_reviews.text: The first one of these I had lasted 10 years. Every spring a can of black high temp black spray paint that took 10 mins. And it last. Thats why we bought the same exact one.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: the svcreen thate opens and closes does not fit
customer_reviews.text: there is a huge gap on the screen that opens and closes. it does not fix. sparks and embers can fall out
customer_reviews.author: nancy Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small area
customer_reviews.text: I love it except for the bottom. On the outside below the actual heating area there’s a curved plate. I think it’s to hold wood but rain water collects in there and I’m afraid it will rust. Otherwise I love it! Perfect for a small area
customer_reviews.author: JODIE J BETTCHER

customer_reviews.title: Cute Chimayo
customer_reviews.text: Thank you, it is a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Julia  Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Decent unit for the money
customer_reviews.text: If you're thinking about trying a chimenea than this is the one to buy. Easy enough to assemble and seems like a sturdy piece. Not sure how long it will hold up if its left outside, but if you get two years out of it and you enjoy sitting by a fire, you can get something high end.
customer_reviews.author: bobbyG

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Nice fire pit, a little low on quality but still a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: Great little addition for a patio.
customer_reviews.text: Used for a little backyard fire in the evenings. Works great and easy to clean out. Recommend purchasing a cover at the same time to prevent rusting.
customer_reviews.author: SusieQ

customer_reviews.title: Fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, only probably 40 minutes to unpack and assemble. Some of the parts need a bit of "convincing" to fit but no major issues. Slightly off level, have to bend the legs to get the chimney to set flat without wobbling.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Heym

customer_reviews.title: Love theses chimneas. This is my 4th one I bought.
customer_reviews.text: The screening doesn't last long but I do use mine hard and stuff with wood for burning.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Hartman

customer_reviews.title: As semi expected but disappointment all in the same
customer_reviews.text: Stratched up, nothing aligns, cheaply made as one should expect with this price. We will see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for outdoor spaces!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for friends, and they love it! Easy to assemble, great fun and really pretty on the pool deck. Looks so nice and super easy to maintain!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Kingsbury

customer_reviews.title: Really nice product that puts out lots of heat!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and gives off lots of heat all the way around. Great for groups. It was a bit tricky assembling but I did it by myself. Should be much easier when 2 people work together. Really love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Summer time
customer_reviews.text: Looks great , puts off a nice glow, easy to clean out
customer_reviews.author: Jimimac

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: A great value for the money. Easily assembled, and should last for years. A great size for a backyard patio. Big enough to handle campfire sized wood.
customer_reviews.author: Larry C.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Cast iron construction is good. Works great on brick patio. Needs a good cover to offset tendency to rust.
customer_reviews.author: james o;shea

customer_reviews.title: Really like this product
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my simple open metal fire pit with this chiminea. Very happy with it. It radiates heat out nicely and generally routes smoke up. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Rothstein

customer_reviews.title: Great chimnea
customer_reviews.text: Great chimnea. Plenty large (which is why we chose this one). Can fit decent size logs.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Schneider

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, don't have to high of expectations for the money. Works perfectly fine, but i wouldn't expect it to last more than a couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: Mike ronzano

customer_reviews.title: great item for the price
customer_reviews.text: works good, have had no problems, been out in the weather for months now, no rust. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Tommy avid do it yourselfer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking chiminea. Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: We love this outdoor fireplace! Looks great and is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Slater

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Awesome item!! Easy to assemble, good quality, looks very nice and warms up great!!
customer_reviews.author: jorge martinez

customer_reviews.title: great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Looks great. It is made from cast iron so it will rust if not covered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The product is a great deal for prices just the right size for patio. Suggest u buy cover for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Jusino

customer_reviews.title: Everyone likes the style
customer_reviews.text: We liked the looks of it. Disappointed that the base is not as sturdy as the top portion
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Great for cool evenings. Just the right size... Also, buy the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Grace S

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our patio
customer_reviews.text: We get compliments on it all the time. For the price you cant beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I used it 4-5 times a week to stay warm while smoking my evening cigars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: BALI OUTDOORS Outdoor Fireplace Wooden Fire Pit, Chimenea, Black
feature_bullets: With round wire mesh screening design enables all direction visibility fire at chiminea
Chiminea ideal for use with firewood and artificial logs
Sliding door and ash tray enables users to add fuel or remove ash with ease
Chiminea firepit features heavy-duty cast iron construction

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars282 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
